item.title: [PI] Someone Can spawn by adding codes into client, How to fix [PI] Repp++
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

[quote=“Camballer, post:2, topic:414338”]You can fix this by jarring your client. Then they simply cant access your client files, but still can play.

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CiDQ7igB6fk[/youtube][/quote]
Jarring your client just archives it and is still completely visible to the public. I assume you meant obfuscation?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Someone Can spawn by adding codes into client, How to fix [PI] Repp++
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

hey i’m using a old pk source of marcbob, and in the first day someone added some lines of code in the client, and now he can do ::item

i did some undercover researsh and found what he did.

1- He decompiled my client so he coudlt edit the client.java

2- He searshed for this [code] if(inputString.equals("::fpson"))
fpsOn = true;
if(inputString.equals("::fpsoff"))
fpsOn = false;
if(inputString.equals("::dataon"))
clientData = true;
if(inputString.equals("::dataoff"))
clientData = false;
/*if(inputString.equals("::noclip")) {
for(int k1 = 0; k1 < 4; k1++) {
for(int i2 = 1; i2 < 103; i2++) {
for(int k2 = 1; k2 < 103; k2++)
aClass11Array1230[k1].anIntArrayArray294[i2][k2] = 0;

							}
						}[/code]

and Under Dataoff he added this if (inputString.startsWith("::item")) { String[] args = inputString.split(" "); int id1 = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int id2 = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); this.stream.createFrame(59); this.stream.writeDWord(1); this.stream.writeDWord(id1); //itemid this.stream.writeDWord(id2); //amount }

so he could spawn and he dropped 2 b p hats, ags and stuff,

i can make a eco reset and give evrybody their points back since this was the first day, but i need to fix this

anyone know’s how to enable this i repp++

Read full topic
